problems.text: Find the sum of the first 15 terms of a geometric sequence where a1 = 4 and r = 3/2.
problems.hint: Use the geometric sum formula and substitute the values.
steps: Write the sum formula: Sn = a1 × (r^n - 1) / (r - 1)

problems.text: Find the sum of an infinite geometric series where a1 = 12 and r = 1/4.
problems.hint: For infinite geometric series, use the formula S∞ = a1 / (1 - r) when |r| < 1.
steps: Use the formula: S∞ = a1 / (1 - r)
